net.adamcin.oakpal.core

Interface PackageListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ScanListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPackageListener, ScriptPackageListener

    @ConsumerType
public interface PackageListener
extends ScanListener
    Primary point of customization for the OakPAL framework.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

        onBeginScan, onEndScan

    • Method Detail

      • onBeginPackage

        void onBeginPackage(org.apache.jackrabbit.vault.packaging.PackageId packageId,
                    File file)
        Called after the package is uploaded to the package manager at the beginning of the scan. Track subsequent events using the package ID provided to this method. This method will only be called once for each package provided to PackageScanner.scanPackages(File...).
        Parameters:
        packageId - the package ID of the newly opened package
        file - the package file that will be opened

      • onBeginSubpackage

        void onBeginSubpackage(org.apache.jackrabbit.vault.packaging.PackageId packageId,
                       org.apache.jackrabbit.vault.packaging.PackageId parentId)
        Called after each subpackage is opened. Track subsequent events using the package ID provided to this method.
        Parameters:
        packageId - the package ID of the newly opened subpackage
        parentId - the package ID of the parent package.

      • onOpen

        void onOpen(org.apache.jackrabbit.vault.packaging.PackageId packageId,
            org.apache.jackrabbit.vault.packaging.PackageProperties packageProperties,
            org.apache.jackrabbit.vault.fs.config.MetaInf metaInf,
            List<org.apache.jackrabbit.vault.packaging.PackageId> subpackages)
        Called for each package before it is extracted.
        Parameters:
        packageId - the package ID of the newly opened package
        packageProperties - the package properties
        metaInf - the package meta information
        subpackages - extracted subpackages

      • onImportPath

        void onImportPath(org.apache.jackrabbit.vault.packaging.PackageId packageId,
                  String path,
                  javax.jcr.Node node)
           throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Notified when package importer adds, modifies, or leaves a node untouched.
        Parameters:
        packageId - the current package
        node - the imported node
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - for obvious reasons

      • onDeletePath

        void onDeletePath(org.apache.jackrabbit.vault.packaging.PackageId packageId,
                  String path)
        Notified when package importer deletes an existing node.
        Parameters:
        packageId - the current package
        path - deleted path

      • onClose

        void onClose(org.apache.jackrabbit.vault.packaging.PackageId packageId,
             javax.jcr.Session inspectSession)
      throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Provides an opportunity to inspect repository state between packages.
        Parameters:
        packageId - the current package
        inspectSession - session providing access to repository state
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - for obvious reasons
